mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.order_custom_record_id, a.broker_name, a.custom_name, a.custom_tel, a.project_info_name, a.record_time, a.report_location, a.record_distance, a.confirm_visit_time, CASE a.record_status WHEN 1 THEN '报备待确认' WHEN 2 THEN '报备无效' WHEN 3 THEN '报备有效' WHEN 4 THEN '报备保护过期' WHEN 5 THEN '到访无效' WHEN 6 THEN '到访有效' WHEN 7 THEN '到访保护过期' END record_status FROM order_custom_record a LEFT JOIN bee_task_personnel b ON a.bee_task_id = b.bee_task_id WHERE a.bee_task_id = #{beeTaskId} and a.broker_id = #{beePersonnelId} AND a.record_channel =3 AND a.record_status in(6,7)

SELECT DISTINCT a.order_custom_record_id, a.broker_name, a.custom_name, a.custom_tel, a.project_info_name, a.record_time, a.report_location, a.confirm_remark, a.record_distance, a.confirm_visit_time, a.record_status FROM order_custom_record a LEFT JOIN bee_task_personnel b ON a.bee_task_id = b.bee_task_id WHERE a.bee_task_id = #{beeTaskId} and a.broker_id = #{beePersonnelId} AND a.record_channel =3 AND a.record_status in(6,7)
ORDER BY #{pageParams.sort} #{pageParams.order} LIMIT #{pageParams.startRow}, #{pageParams.endRow}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM order_custom_record a LEFT JOIN bee_task_personnel b ON a.bee_task_id = b.bee_task_id WHERE a.bee_task_id =#{beeTaskId} and a.broker_id = #{beePersonnelId} AND a.record_channel =3 AND a.record_status in(6,7) GROUP BY a.order_custom_record_id) tt;
